messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] shitsumon itashimasu !!!
messages.msgSnippet: Henji arigato, M-sama !!! Sokka ? Moeyo Ken no eigo version ga naika... (inta-netto kara moratta mono.. he he) Sou desune. Tashika ni Vol. 2 ( ge no hou ) ni
messages.messageBody:
Henji arigato, M-sama !!!
Sokka ? 'Moeyo Ken" no eigo version ga naika... (inta-netto kara moratta mono.. he he)

Sou desune. Tashika ni Vol. 2 ( ge no hou ) ni kaitearun desukedo, sou iu nagakute, sokkuri na serifu wa ,,eeto,, nainaa...
( or maybe its just the kotoba changes into english translation... kana.. )

Kedo, arigatoune..
Hontou ni tasukatta..
Mata nanka attara, shitsumon sasete itadakimasu.

Rei

"--- M." <patriot014@...> wrote:
It's the one he says during the Boshin-sensou, right? Something like "I know
I'm not going to win. The Tokugawa shogunate is going down, and it'd be a
shame if no one were to go down with it." My guess would be that it would be
in volume 2 of the Japanese version. Sorry I can't help you more than that.
Watashi mo sono shosetsu wo motteirun desuga, ima wa hikkoshi-chuu dakara,
kyuu ni hako ni hatteimasu. Gomen nasai.

To my knowledge, "Moeyo Ken" does not exist in English, though I have
translated passages from its first chapter here and there.

-M.

messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] shitsumon itashimasu !!!
messages.msgSnippet: It s the one he says during the Boshin-sensou, right? Something like I know I m not going to win. The Tokugawa shogunate is going down, and it d be a shame if
messages.messageBody:
It's the one he says during the Boshin-sensou, right? Something like "I know
I'm not going to win. The Tokugawa shogunate is going down, and it'd be a
shame if no one were to go down with it." My guess would be that it would be
in volume 2 of the Japanese version. Sorry I can't help you more than that.
Watashi mo sono shosetsu wo motteirun desuga, ima wa hikkoshi-chuu dakara,
kyuu ni hako ni hatteimasu. Gomen nasai.

To my knowledge, "Moeyo Ken" does not exist in English, though I have
translated passages from its first chapter here and there.

-M.

>to win .......... That is what I must go. I will fight the best battle of

> ( Nihongo no shousetsu motterun desuga, sono Hijikata no serifu wa doko
>ni kaite attakke ? Jou - ge aru deshou ? Tashika ge no bun ni kaitearu
>darou ? Moshi nihongo no bun wo motteru hito ga itara, oshiete
>kudasaimasenka ? )

messages.subject: shitsumon itashimasu !!!
messages.msgSnippet: Mina sama, konnichiwa !!! I ve never read english version of Moeyo Ken , so is there anyone who could tell me in what page Hijikata Toshizou words I m not
messages.messageBody:
Mina sama, konnichiwa !!!

I've never read english version of "Moeyo Ken", so is there anyone who could tell me in what page Hijikata Toshizou words "I'm not going to battle to win .......... That is what I must go. I will fight the best battle of my life ..." was written at ??
( Nihongo no shousetsu motterun desuga, sono Hijikata no serifu wa doko ni kaite attakke ? Jou - ge aru deshou ? Tashika ge no bun ni kaitearu darou ? Moshi nihongo no bun wo motteru hito ga itara, oshiete kudasaimasenka ? )

Arigatou gozaimasu...
Kore karamo yoroshiku onegai itashimasune !!!

Ja, henji matteruyo.

Rei

messages.messageBody:
Have no idea on how I got that messed up. But yes...must've been a bad day for me. Sorry for the mix up. But still people Its up and ready. Need all the recruits I need.

messages.subject: Shinsengumi Team
messages.msgSnippet: Well Ive actually done it. Ive made a shinsengumi reenactment team. Im putting this out because its open to Shinsengumi HQ Members to join all over the united
messages.messageBody:
Well Ive actually done it. Ive made a shinsengumi reenactment team. Im
putting this out because its open to Shinsengumi HQ Members to join all
over the united states. The Website is
http://www.myspace.com/shinsengumi09

To join sign up and send a friends request to the team and it will go
from there. The site is deticated to the ShinsengumiHQ and wouldnt go
anywhere with out them.

P.S.-I know its been along time since I sent something. Im sorry
guys...just been busy with school and track. But Im here for
good....and everyone....dont forget May 28th...The greatest swordsmens
death date. Poor Okita.
